overview: Paul Thomas presents five tales of lust and lies, featuring Holly Sampson... who apparently knows a thing or two about deception. See the alleged "seventh mistress" of The Golf Great, as she battles Vivid superstars Savanna and AJ Bailey for sexual supremacy. Also with two scorching anals, and an interracial scene you won't soon forget. PT tells the tales. B.Skow shoots. Have your nin iron ready.
title: Screwed Over
